name: Crystalis: The Untold Chronicles
description:
This game is a proof of concept for a top down 2D Zelda-like RPG that I'm making. It features a functioning inventory system, battle system, tools, daggers, bombs, and herbs.

Fight through a town under siege by enemy soldiers and face a big boss at the end :)

CONTROLS
X - Slash your sword
C - Use an item while the inventory menu is active
V - Throw a bomb
Z - Throw a dagger
Enter - Toggle inventory menu.

Graphics are from the game, Crystalis. Sound effects and music are from pond5.com, mixkit.co, and free-stock-music.com.
